SEARCH
Package SpaceShooters

Class Game

java.lang.Object
SpaceShooters.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game class represents the main controller for the game. It manages the game mode, player, shots, and game events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(Player p, MainWindow owner)
    Constructs a Game instance with a player and owner window.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Player p, MainWindow owner)
      Constructs a Game instance with a player and owner window.
      Parameters:
      p - The Player object representing the player in the game.
      owner - The MainWindow object that owns this game instance.

  • Method Details

    • setupGameType

      public void setupGameType(GameMode gameType)
      Sets up the game with the specified game mode.
      Parameters:
      gameType - The GameMode object representing the type of game to be played.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game, triggering the game ends observer and awarding experience and money to the player.

    • shipShot

      public void shipShot(Shot shot)
      Adds a shot fired by a ship to the shot list.
      Parameters:
      shot - The Shot object representing the shot fired.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Retrieves the player associated with this game.
      Returns:
      The Player object representing the player in the game.

    • getGameMode

      public GameMode getGameMode()
      Retrieves the current game mode of this game.
      Returns:
      The GameMode object representing the current game mode.

    • getShotList

      public List<Shot> getShotList()
      Retrieves the list of shots fired in the game.
      Returns:
      A List of Shot objects representing shots fired in the game.

    • setObserver

      public void setObserver(GameFrame gameFrame)
      Sets the observer for game events to the specified GameFrame.
      Parameters:
      gameFrame - The GameFrame object to be set as the observer for game events.

    • setObserver

      public void setObserver(GameEndsObserver gameEndsObserver)
      Sets the observer for game events to the specified GameEndsObserver.
      Parameters:
      gameEndsObserver - The GameEndsObserver object to be set as the observer for game events.

    • playerShipDestroyed

      public void playerShipDestroyed()
      Notifies the observer that the player's ship has been destroyed.
